extensions.name: redhat.java
extensions.description: Provides Java language support via Eclipse JDT Language Server, which utilizes Eclipse JDT, M2Eclipse and Buildship to allow for a rich Java development experience.

extensions.name: vscjava.vscode-java-debug
extensions.description: Offers powerful debugging support for Java applications, including launch/attach configurations, breakpoints, step through, variables inspection, and expression evaluation.

extensions.name: vscjava.vscode-java-dependency
extensions.description: Views and manages project dependencies directly in Visual Studio Code, enhancing Java project management and navigation capabilities.

extensions.name: vscjava.vscode-java-pack
extensions.description: A collection of essential Java extensions to support Java development, including editing, debugging, testing, and project management.

extensions.name: vscjava.vscode-java-test
extensions.description: Provides support for running and debugging JUnit and TestNG test cases, making it easier to perform test-driven development in Java.

extensions.name: vscjava.vscode-maven
extensions.description: Integrates Maven into Visual Studio Code, offering features like project creation, dependency management, and custom Maven goals execution.
